text: Hi Zahra, lovely to meet you too! I hope you're well?
It's great that you've discovered something you're so passionate about early on and you're so pro-active too! :slightly_smiling_face:

I'm an Operations Manager at Big Pixel Studios, we make the Rick and Morty mobile games (most notably Pocket Mortys) and I essentially run the operational day to day of the studio, including recruitment and outreach! So although I don't actually work on the games I'm sure I can give you advice and loop you up with some of our art team in house too!

Depending on where you're based I'm more than happy to meet up over a coffee and even give you a bit of an in-house tour. But it might be good for you to start thinking about why you signed up and what you're hoping to get out of this mentorship so we can create some goals?
